page.title: 10Barclays Bank of New Milton
page.content: There are 5{banks}in our{D-Block}. We interviewed the manager of{Barclays {Bank}. He told us that the{bank}is busiest on Mondays and Fridays when they can expect to collect around Â£100,000. The money is placed in a strong room and there are 2 sequences of numbers which open the combination lock, of which the manager only knows one. The{bank}opens to the public at 9.30 a.m. and closes at 3.30 p.m. five days a week, but the manager told us that the{bank}will shortly be opening on Saturday mornings as well. { Barclays Bank}is built on the site of an old cake shop, and in 1984 the{bank {celebrated its 60th anniversary}. They are about to extend the building for {computers} and other machinery.
